inicio.objetivo: The objective of DermoApp is to support patients with dermatological problems in the diagnosis and treatment of dermatological lesions, as well as in locating specialized dermatologists close to the areas where a patient lives, whenever possible.

registroUsuario.minimoCaracteresNombre: The name needs a minimum of 4 characters
registroUsuario.maximoCaracteresNombre: The name needs a maximum of 60 characters
registroUsuario.minimoCaracteresLugarResidencia: Residence needs a minimum of 4 characters
registroUsuario.maximoCaracteresLugarResidencia: The residence needs a maximum of 20 characters
registroUsuario.minimoCaracteresContrasena: The password name needs a minimum of 4 characters
registroUsuario.maximoCaracteresContrasena: Password needs a maximum of 60 characters
registroUsuario.labelAceptaTerminosRequerido: Accepting terms and conditions is required.

perfilDermatologico.preguntaCabello: What is the color of your hair (natural and before aging)?
perfilDermatologico.preguntaPiel: What is the color of your skin (unexposed areas)?
perfilDermatologico.preguntaPecas: Do you have freckles in unexposed areas?
perfilDermatologico.preguntaSensibilidad: Do you have freckles in unexposed areas?
perfilDermatologico.preguntaExposicionSol: What happens to your skin if you are exposed to the sun for a long period of time?
perfilDermatologico.preguntaBronceo: Do you tan after exposing yourself to the sun?
perfilDermatologico.preguntaCaraSensibleSol: Is your face sensitive to the sun?
perfilDermatologico.preguntaUltimavezBronceo: When was the last time you exposed your skin to sun tanning or artificial sources (tanning beds)?

cuerpo.escogerContinuar: You must choose a body part to continue

detalleConsulta.placeHolderFormaLesion: Select the shape of the injuries
detalleConsulta.placeHolderNombreLesion: Write the name of the injury
detalleConsulta.nombreLesionRequerida: The name of the injury is required
detalleConsulta.minnombreLesionRequerida: The name of the injury must have a minimum of 6 characters
detalleConsulta.maxnombreLesionRequerida: The name of the injury must have a maximum of 24 characters
detalleConsulta.mindiagnosticoRequerido: The diagnosis must have a minimum of 20 characters
detalleConsulta.maxdiagnosticoRequerido: The diagnosis must have a maximum of 200 characters
detalleConsulta.mintratamientoRequerido: The treatment must have a minimum of 20 characters
detalleConsulta.maxtratamientoRequerido: The treatment must have a maximum of 200 characters

crearConsulta.infoPaciente: To create a query, the patient must provide basic information about the injury.
